attributes.action: Stop calories being displayed on menus in restaurants
attributes.background: The idea of adding calories to menus not only promotes eating disorders to develop or worsen, it also completely goes against helping tackle obesity. The anxiety this causes as someone in anorexia recovery is overwhelming. Along with millions of young people, this could take away yet another

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585685
